ai-tha-ap40:1.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap40:2.2_0: Having given it up at the root,
ai-tha-ap40:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap40:2.4_0: Is the heir to build a robe
ai-tha-ap40:3.1_0: When the gods recall these eight eons
ai-tha-ap40:3.4_0: I’ve transmigrated for a long time,
ai-tha-ap40:4.4_0: This is the fruit of the good.
ai-tha-ap40:5.1_0: whatever I wish to enter the rains residence
ai-tha-ap40:6.2_0: I only used to live for thirty-two times,
ai-tha-ap40:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap40:7.4_0: This is the fruit of the good.
ai-tha-ap40:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uttara.
ai-tha-ap40:10.1_0: he gave the eighth Elder Nuns,
